website_summaries.verdict: When your shoulders need a rest, just roll this backpack alongside you.
pros: The padded shoulder straps are easily stowed away when you need to wheel this bag
A single pole retractable handle steers with traction and stability control
The pack contains a padded sleeve to hold a 15-inch laptop
cons: The retractable handle doesn't stand up to constant use

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Really love this backpack! I’m a college student and it fits 4 textbooks, a large binder and a laptop WITH room to spare! Really sturdy. I tried an off market brand first that was cheaper and I really should have gotten this one first because you definitely get what you pay for. Also Jansport has a lifetime warranty so if anything happens (knock on wood) I have that just in case! Worth the $$$!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Cheap.  Zipper broke first time we tried to put notebooks in it!
customer_reviews.text: We just put my daughters notebooks in the bag for the beginning of school. The zipper brok instantly. I am so disappointed and angry! Way to go Jansport. Your products used to be so good, but this thing is really cheap. I will never buy another one of your products again. I am sending it to the warranty center, but now I have to spend the extra $ to buy another backpack while I wait for you to do something about your crummy product. Shame on you for making such a cheap product, and for charging so much for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best rolling backpack I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. The wheels are sturdy and rugged which can handle asphalt, dirt, rocks, and cement like a champ. Its feminine but reminds me of cherry blossoms. There is so much room in the section for a laptop. I can fit at least 2 2" binders in addition to the laptop. There are so many pockets and the key clamp is so helpful. The best part is the telescopic handle is the perfect height for me. I am 5'6" tall. It doesn't hurt my back to walk with it. Thank you, Jansport!
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Best bag I’ve had yet!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a nursing student and needed something durable.. my back had been aching from my Nike backpack. This one saved me from a load of back pain. I love the link camo. Still in great shape after a semester of bad weather and heavy books.
customer_reviews.author: Rocker of Casbahs

customer_reviews.title: Kiddo is in LOVE with this bag!
customer_reviews.text: So... we had a nice bookbag from last year but with the changes to schooling this year we needed something BIG. There aren't any locker access so my 6th grader has to carry all her needed books for the day. This bag is PERFECT!!! She can just roll it around school instead of carrying. We weighed her books and they were 35# and being that my daughter only weighs 70# we needed another option and this was PERFECT. Its also awesome that its GORGEOUS! Built well. Very Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Does not tip over
customer_reviews.text: Bag is spacious for school materials as well as still having room to add lunchkit, snacks, etc. The bottom of the school bag is spaced right so that the bag constantly stands upright no matter if there is a little or a lot of stuff in the bag. We had problems with a previous school bag from another name brand that never stood upright. So far, the materials all look good and work reliably. Update: Over a year later the bag is still holding up as previously mentioned and is used every day of the school year.
customer_reviews.author: Sk8brd

customer_reviews.title: awsome backpack
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my daughter who has scoliosis. very well made and has a lot of compartments. also love the wheels and the handle. makes this perfect for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: james f maher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rolling book bag
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this rolling backpack. Its large capacity and compartments hold 3 very large books, folders, laptop cushion, and wide notebook, and yet is compact when empty. The product material is thick and durable with strong stable wheels. I can easily roll my way around campus with a large Yeti cup in the side beverage compartment and lunch in tow. The super cute pattern makes for a rolling carry-on weekender bag when travelling. The only caveat is having to carry by the handle up high stairs, which fortunately is rare for me. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Razzzy

customer_reviews.title: Its the best backpack!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best backpack ever. I just received it today. I am in medical assistant school and I have a lot of books to carry so this backpack is great for that.
customer_reviews.author: Babygirl nesha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect backpack for nursing school!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has been a lifesaver for me. When I started nursing school I was using a regular Jansport backpack. My books and computer were so heavy that I started having shoulder and neck pain. I was torn between this particular backpack and a High Sierra one but ultimately went with this one. I am very glad that I did. A few friends bought the High Sierra, and mine is definitely more spacious. I can pack a lot of stuff in here and still have room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3minions

customer_reviews.title: rolling backpacks should be a must for skaters.
customer_reviews.text: I can fit 2 pairs of rollerskates, helmet, pads set, 2nd wheel set, water bottle, t-tool, first aid kit, and speakers in this bag in an organized manner! Since it stands up, the base doesn't get filthy at the park. The pattern is feminine without being kitschy. And most importantly, it rolls with me so I don't have to struggle with my gear when I have my wheels on.
customer_reviews.author: E. Scott

customer_reviews.title: We love!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my younger daughter (6) because the one my oldest has has held up so great. The handle extends and retracts very easily. Rolls great. So many compartments and pockets. Also stands up when it is FULL (they go to a university model school and have to take text books to and from school during the week...LOTS of books and it still stands up!).
customer_reviews.author: E Dozal

customer_reviews.title: Mixed bag
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 3.5 if I could. I love the look and the convenience of having a roller or backpack option. It's a well designed piece with just the right number of pockets and compartments. Unfortunately, the zippers are a little sticky and I'm worried they will really jam up some day. The material also seems too thin. Hasn't torn yet, but the feel of it does not instill confidence. I guess I expected more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Peg Morrison

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: The bag is huge!! I love it!! The only concern it is the squicky noise in one of the wheels, but I did not returned because it is such a pain to go and dropped and then ordering a new one. Anyway I guess I can handle the noise... other than that it is perfect for my nursing school
customer_reviews.author: K James

customer_reviews.title: Overall great bag
customer_reviews.text: Love the design. The price is a little high. Perfect for my kid since their bag is so heavy. I love that it has the straps to put in your back too. I only wish those straps could be tied up so they dont drag on the ground. They are going to get gross quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Ginormous Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is HUGE. Like the size of a carryon suitcase, though if you brought it on a plane they might make you check it. I carry a lot of stuff but this was too big for me. If I brought this to work everyday, people would think I was homeless and living out of my bag. This might work if you are carrying around a ton of large books or an oxygen tank or something. It also was not free to return!
customer_reviews.author: Anna L

customer_reviews.title: Saves my back
customer_reviews.text: I read zillions of reviews online before getting this bag. The amazon price is the lowest of all vendors. I have been it using this for about 2 months now. Pros: Saves my back Rolls smoothly Cons: all kinds of hair and gunk get stuck in the wheels from rolling it on streets. The bag is not spacious. The placement of the bar that is connected to the pull-along handle is in the center of the bag. It feels hard and also reduces the stuff that can be in the bag. I feel that my regular backpacks of comparable size hold more stuff. The computer pouch/sleeve is very tight and a 13 inch laptop sticks out on top.
customer_reviews.author: enkay

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is sturdy and rolls smoothly. The color is not very deep and vibrant but it's cute. Once you put in your laptop it gets kind of wonky. I bought mine used. Looked brand new and I would recommend this backpack for a laptop personal stuff and nothing too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT (for now - but I hope for forever always!)
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BACKPACK! I had to get this backpack due to having spine issues, but I need my laptop and etc. for school! This back pack holds a LOT and I am in love with how it rolls around! Also has a water bottle holder, so it's perfect! Needless to say, I am so happy with this, I just really hope it holds up - I would honestly be so sad if it didn't!
customer_reviews.author: Artsy

customer_reviews.title: had to return only because too big for 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: great bag gorgeous colours everything perfect I had to return only because was too large for my 8 year old grand daughter I ordered the small size. I recommend this one highly very well made looks great strong, wheels great!
customer_reviews.author: Aviva

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy rolling backpack.
customer_reviews.text: You can always count on Jansport to provide a good quality backpack. Rolls easy, larger size for ALL of my twins school supplies. Heavy duty and JANSPORT quality. Does have "hidden" straps, but with all the supplies it's filled with my girls haven't (and won't) use them.
customer_reviews.author: DGA

customer_reviews.title: Saves the back
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this and it's been very helpful to transport all the books and binders Middle and High schoolers need!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used this bag for 4th and 5th grade and it’s still in good shape. She’s banged this thing up and down the stairs at school, and the wheels and handle are still in good shape. The only reason why we are retiring the bag is because she wants a new style for middle school.
customer_reviews.author: Girly8888

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! It’s spacious (very), cute and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, wheels run super smoothly, lots of space inside- THANK YOU
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for your great product. The wheels run super smoothly and the bag has so much space to put everything inside. My daughter (6 yrs old) loves it very much and so do we.
customer_reviews.author: Khulan Gantsog

customer_reviews.title: Great roller backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is a well constructed and good looking backpack. My daughter was excited to get it for school and loves the way it looks. It's built well as all JanSport bags are and should last certainly for the school year and beyond. I would recommend this bag and JanSport.
customer_reviews.author: Ben C.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love it, but not much room for a larger laptop. Wheels also catch on things.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I made
customer_reviews.text: Used as my personal carry on item on plane for weekend trip. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Masters

customer_reviews.title: Didn't make it two weeks to school
customer_reviews.text: Backpack broke during the 9th day of day, didn't even make it home. It's past the return window as well, so I lost $50 on this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: MeDammit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I loved my new backpack with rollers - It took me through a long trip perfectly - It stored all I needed, it saved my back (I usually use backpacks without rollers, but trying to give my back a break, now!), it was easy to maneuver throughout airports with it's unique design - I never had to look closely to distinguish it from all the black backpacks! Loved the way it looks! Absolutely coming with me for any future travels, short or long!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Jarkovsky

customer_reviews.title: Space limited
customer_reviews.text: The compartments are pretty good, the backpack is durable overall, the handling is expected, but the space inside the main compartment is awkward. Awkward meaning - the bottom of the backpack is not padded and the wheels take up space making the bottom uneven. I wish there was more space wider rather than taller in each compartment because it's too tight of a fit for all my textbooks and binders, and other school necessities. As with delivery and information, they were excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Ipo

customer_reviews.title: Saving my shoulders!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Im 40+ And back in school; textbooks are damned heavy - throw in a laptop too and a regular backpack was just too much. This works great. It’s very roomy and the wheels are super rugged.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndie

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I teach at the college level and have to haul an office with me to class. This backpack is big (wish it were a little bigger) and carries my stuff, while the pretty floral is cheery. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D. Kieffaber

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and Effective
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter’s last year at middle schools they took the lockers out so she had to tote around binders, computer, lunch boxes, water... it was crazy. Very durrable and reliable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I took this bag along on a six-week trip to SE Asia. Carry-on luggage gets heavy when lugged all over many airports. I'm not sure how many flights I took, but this bag wore well. Many of the planes were smaller and I managed to just smush the bag up into most all the overheads. I have a very similar bag without wheels that I'd used for car trips and was excited to find the same configuration with wheels. Loved the color I chose because it made it easier remembering what was in which section. It has held up well and has "earned" another trip to SE Asia come January.
customer_reviews.author: Em Perdue

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of books that are too heavy to carry on my back. This wheeled backpack is perfect for hauling those heavy books around.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Washington

customer_reviews.title: Well made great product
customer_reviews.text: Our girls needed these for school this year. They are awesome-VERY spacious and roll well. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: JACinFL

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Will fit all her books. I like it rolling so that all the wait isnt on her back or shoulders. Very pretty
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Well built backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is well made, holds a ton of binders and books, and can handle my 12 yo pulling it up the stairs. No complaints and much better than the other wheelies I bought
customer_reviews.author: D Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Defective handle!
customer_reviews.text: I received this bag this evening and was disappointed that the "2 stage" handle is defective. I am a teacher who travels in a very crowded hallway, and I purchased this bag because I wanted the shorter handle to avoid tripping other teachers and students. This bag handle will not clip into the shorter length; it feels like it simply isn't catching. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong and expansive
customer_reviews.text: This has been perfect for my middle school daughter. With COVID -19 they don’t have lockers. This backpack has become her locker on wheels. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Backpack in the history of ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a purchase for my girlfriend. She says, "This backpack carries 5 very heavy nursing books, my netbook and all my accessories including my wallet and water bottle and I still have a free compartment. The wheels are very sturdy and roll over everything I take it on. The adjustable handle is perfect! The solid base at the bottom makes it stand up without out falling over." This backpack is perfect for any person with any back problems. Totally worth the asking price.
customer_reviews.author: Someone Else

customer_reviews.title: Large and easy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in middle school loves this. So easy to take from class to class. Huge capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Milan

customer_reviews.title: I could not be happier!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this rolling backpack so much, I bought two (different patterns though). Loads of storage and sturdy. Lifetime Warranty! It's perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Jansport Rocks
customer_reviews.text: My Grade 3 like it. it can be back pack and a strollwr. 2 in 1. Enough room for her things to go inside the bag. Plus she loves the flower design
customer_reviews.author: Niccolo Panlilio

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Bag!! We bought it 3 years ago and our DD has used it for school now for 3 years. It holds up VERY well, so nice to roll it instead of lug around heavy books all day. Fabric easily wipes up with a cloth and a spot treater to keep it looking nice. Highly recommend this brand!!!!
customer_reviews.author: sunnylane

customer_reviews.title: Coming undone
customer_reviews.text: After nine months the blue edging is coming undone. Bought four year warranty so let's hope this isn't an ordeal, as the book bag was expensive to begin with
customer_reviews.author: M. Drake

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag for Middle-school with only one issue...
customer_reviews.text: I love the sturdiness of this bag, the ease of use of the telescoping handle (it's very smooth) and the organization this bag offers. My one and only disappoinment is that the zipper of the main compartment gets hung up on the curved part of the bag where it is more rigid. I almost forgot, but one more thing I like about this back is that it stands upright and doesn't fall forward when loaded with books. My only concern is if it will fit into my daughter's locker at school.
customer_reviews.author: SweetTriks

customer_reviews.title: Unexpectedly spacious
customer_reviews.text: Unexpectedly spacious. Has rain flaps which are good and bad-harder to zip but keep the rain/snow out of the bag. Rolls very nicely. Nice beverage port on the side.
customer_reviews.author: aheyms

customer_reviews.title: True Soldier
customer_reviews.text: It handled a year in the 7th grade at a school with no lockers with grace. Preteens 0, Jansport 1.
customer_reviews.author: S. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has put up with a lot of abuse. The only issue that I have had is that the handle sometimes gets stuck and takes a little force to retract.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: You definitely want this if you commute for work or school.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag on wheels. Perfect for work on the go and stuffing more than your typical demand (notebook, computer, pencil case, lunch, etc). Will only purchase these as they are great quality and easy to commute with. Always receive compliments on design too.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, 2nd time purchasing!
customer_reviews.text: Great rolling back pack! This is my second time purchasing this bag, the first one last my daughter 2 years from 4-5th grade and is still in decent condition with a little wear and tear. If you need a rolling bag to carry heavy books I highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: B_flwr

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who’s in sixth grade. She loves the pattern and that it holds all her books. She doesn’t have a locker so she has to carry everything with her and this makes it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Francine H

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this book bag for a year and a half for nursing school caring around 50 to 70 pounds of books and it’s held up perfectly plenty of space for all the things I need to carry on a day today basis
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great little backpack
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to take on travel trips, it is the perfect size for a carry on in planes. The 1st one I had to send back because one wheel did not work but the replacement works great. It holds a lot of clothes, has small compartments to fill with things you don't want to fall to the bottom of the pack. The wheels roll nice , it beats having to haul around a heavy bag in the airports .Gotta love the color. We are planning on getting another one for my husband to take along on our journeys.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great school backpack. Straps in the back hang a bit low so they drag on the floor when my daughter pulls the bag. Wish there was a way to tuck the straps in.
customer_reviews.author: E Davis

customer_reviews.title: Well made, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my daughter for her school bag. She has a lot of books that she has to carry each day and this saves her back and makes the job a breeze. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: W Rich

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I love the rolling backpack! Great quality and durability
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad shoulder so carrying a regular bag or backpack was not an option for me when I decided to go back to school for nursing. I needed something to hold my laptop, my iPad, and one or two nursing books and a spiral notebook (plus all the extras like pens, etc.) This bag is awesome! It holds everything I need for class and no stress on my back or shoulders. The wheels are great and I've had no problems so far. I love that it has more than one compartment and a place to hold one of my water bottles. I haven't used it for travel yet but I'm sure it will work great for short trips.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K. Dewispelaere

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: may daughter love it. It looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and it worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I brought it for my grand daughter to go school she love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Nice buyer.

customer_reviews.title: Envious
customer_reviews.text: Envious! That's how the other travelers look at me in the airport. Not only is this an attractive color but also it is so versatile and easy to maneuver. It can hold all of my work items including my computer plus plenty of room for some personal items as well. It is a snug fit under the seat but it does fit! I am the envy of my office too since I use it even when I am not traveling. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Gold

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It made it easier to carry all my things around and it is very stylish!
customer_reviews.author: dianec323

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a surprise for my daughter and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: JanSport Roller Backpack for teenagers
customer_reviews.text: My teenage daughter has had this backpack for only one month, but it seems to be very sturdy. Everytime I get a roller backpack the handle breaks after just a few months. I hope this one will last longer. My daugther loves it, it has enough room for all her books, and the color is perfect, purple, her favorite color! I think this roller backpack is perfect for teenagers!
customer_reviews.author: Fifilleaparis

customer_reviews.title: Less than a year
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this backpack, but after eight months of use the handle stopped moving up and down. I went online to purchase another and it is no longer available.
customer_reviews.author: claricia s. shepherd

customer_reviews.title: best rolling backpack ever!
customer_reviews.text: This will hold two of my binders, two large textbooks and still room for my laptop and my lunch. There is room in front for pens and odds and ends and the large wheels will roll over just about anything without mishap. The only downside is that sometimes when I really load it up, it looks like there is too much pressure on the zipper, so I'm careful.
customer_reviews.author: mobetta

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my granddaughter’s birthday. She loves it; it is roomy enough to bring everything she needs and wants when she comes to to spend the night . It hasn’t been tested in rain or travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jansport Privileges
customer_reviews.text: I am very please with my jansport bag. It's very light, easy to push, can put a lot of stuff without problem. I had one before which was wonderful. It's got top material can stay years and years. It's a bit expensive but it's worth it to afford without doubt. I had been searching on Internet for weeks and weeks until I found the one who can deliver it where I live. I receive it even before the time spouse to delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Maysa Mustafa

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome and convenient to use
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfectly fits of my needs as a nursing student. I could bring all my binders and books everyday to school or to the public library. This is awesome and convenient to use. Though the price is twice higher than the other brands, but it is sturdy and spacious.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this book bag. I have an 8th grader and she has a lot of books. It is very roomy and easy to pull around. It does have strap, but has a place to tuck them if you do not want to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: got this to transport my teacher stuff back and forth and I just LOVE it!! well made
customer_reviews.author: cjw139740

customer_reviews.title: A real back saver
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my granddaughter who was complaining about her back bothering her due to the weight of her school books. Since she can now wheel them, she has no complaints and the school found the product acceptable for her to use. She is now in middle school and can even use it there.
customer_reviews.author: yaya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is great for my daughter who has to walk to school and in warm temperatures too!
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fall of 2018. Happy with this product. Lots of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Farrell

customer_reviews.title: it would have been perfect if more padding was added to the back bag ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the bag. It rolls smoothly and has ample space. Although it's a rolling bag, it would have been perfect if more padding was added to the back bag and if the adjustable part of the straps was wider.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Holds a ton backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my 7th grade son. It is extremely well made, the wheels move easily, the handle pulls out easily and it is stylish looking. Hopefully he will get a couple of years use out of it. As he says, it would also make a great carry-on bag. There are plenty of pockets for organizing books and supplies.
customer_reviews.author: T's mom

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for someone who has to carry a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for someone who has to carry a lot of books and has a long walk from the parking lot. It will save your back. I bought this for my girlfriend who is in Grad school and it helps with all the stuff she has to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Balderas

customer_reviews.title: Back-saving book bag
customer_reviews.text: My 5th grade daughter specifically requested this bag after having a messenger-type book bag last year. She admitted that shoulder bags were a horrible idea for school (I had to keep myself from saying "I told you so!")and that she was not too cool for a rolling back pack. Currently, her rolling bag is stuffed with books and supplies; just what she and her young back needed.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia J. Morton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic and gigantic. I’m taking a class with a huge amont oh texts.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle Schauben

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Material feels strong and it has a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Kenesha

customer_reviews.title: Backpack for a nurse
customer_reviews.text: Large enough for a nursing student with big, heavy books!
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Poor qualiry
customer_reviews.text: Got this backpack a few months back and the zippers are not working. It was not a cheap backpack so I would have expected for it to last longer. Wish there was a way to return/exchange it. It cannot be used since the zippers don't close.
customer_reviews.author: iriana romero

customer_reviews.title: Back Saver!
customer_reviews.text: As a nursing student, we frequently need to carry multiple large text books, along with a computer, this bag is up for the challenge! I would highly suggest getting this bag if looking for a good quality wheeled bag. It has stood up through snow and rain and -30 temperatures so far this year, and i have only had it not even a month yet!
customer_reviews.author: Anna F.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: First week into school the handle broke.. tried to contact the seller and got no response!
customer_reviews.author: haley robin

customer_reviews.title: Durable and she loves it!
customer_reviews.text: She absolutely loves Jan backpack designs. With the corona this year we were not able to get lockers so she loved the roller backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not roomy enough for the price
customer_reviews.text: I thought Jansport was supposed to be one of the top backpack brands and I have to say I am disappointed. This does not fit my daughter's binder and 1-2 books. It needs another 2-4" of room on either side. This is not amazon's fault, still love this web site though.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great Rolling Large Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was the only one I could find large enough for the amount of books my MSer brings home. It is very sturdy, stays upright, rolls beautifully and is easily maneuvered. It was also $40 cheaper than purchasing in a local store. So far very pleased with the construction.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 2 in MD

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag to carry all of my heavy nursing school books. Works perfectly! Has a lot of compartments. I've had it for quite a while now, and I haven't had any problems. Quality bag! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cass1

customer_reviews.title: JanSport Driver 8 Core Series
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a 70+ year-old friend, a musician studying for a music degree in Oakland. Lugging his many notebooks, books and music between classes was not an option and a shoulder backpack was out of the question. He did his usual thorough research on similar products and this is the one he selected. He is very happy ("delighted" is the word he used) with his choice and it has made his movements about campus a whole lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Brundage-Neill

customer_reviews.title: After 4 months it broke!?!?
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market for a new computer bag and I also needed a bag for school and work. My current bag was putting a major strain on my shoulders and I wanted to get a rolling bag that didn't look too business. When I first found the JanSport bag I was thrilled, it was sporty, had wheels, and looked well built. After 4 monthes of normal use, the retractable handle is BROKEN! I plan on writing a letter to the company to let them know of my disappointment with this product. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: K. Koene

customer_reviews.title: Holds heavy books and still easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Lasted all year and could easily be used for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: DANA PRATO

customer_reviews.title: Great Rolller Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This rolling backpack is Awesome!!! It has a lot of pockets for all of my daughters school books and lunch box.
customer_reviews.author: DANA

customer_reviews.title: Has held up well, but my 3rd grader is ...
customer_reviews.text: Has held up well, but my 3rd grader is saving it until 5th grade. It's held up well and should last 2-3 more years. Holds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal mom

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I have to haul 2 laptops to work and back on public transportation. This backpack is great because empty, it's extremly lightweight and so when it's full, it's still manageable. I only wish it was in a more "mature" color of purple. I just laugh it off, though, as my "little girl" bag.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I really love it. I’ll update should something go awry...
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of space! Just what I needed for nursing school
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Granddaughter for school and she Loves it!! She was so excited that she has it packed already! Thank you so much! 😉
customer_reviews.author: Pam R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I bought this backpack. I have been using it for a month and it is great. Very easy to use, whether pulling or pushing. The handle has multiple levels that it can be set at to accommodate people of different heights. It has the ability to hold a great deal of things. I can load up books and supplies for class, as well as food, and I still have quite a bit of room. The wheels are very sturdy. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Smith

product_meta.title: JanSport Driver 8 Core Series Wheeled Backpack
product_meta.description:
DETAILS: For a life on-the-move, the JanSport Driver 8 Rolling Backpack converts from backpack to roller with tuck-away shoulder straps. This wheeled laptop backpack features a padded 15-inch laptop sleeve, side water bottle pocket, and front organizer pocket. FEATURES: 80 mm inline skate wheels, Front stash pocket, Front utility pocket with organizer, Fully padded back panel, Padded grab handle, Padded sleeve fits 15" laptop, two-stage handle, Side water bottle pocket, Skid rails for added protection, Tuck-away shoulder straps for converting to backpack, and Two large main compartments. SPECIFICATIONS: STYLE: TN89 CAPACITY: 2175 cu in / 36 L DIMENSIONS: 21" x 14" x 10" / 53 x 35 x 25 cm FABRIC: 600 Denier polyester / 420 Denier Nylon, LAPTOP DIMENSIONS: 11.5" x 10.5" x 1.5" / 29 x 27 x 4 cm WEIGHT: 5 lbs / 3 kg

AMAZON.COM
Take the strain off your shoulders with the JanSport Driver 8 Metro Roller daypack, which features large, side-mounted 80mm (3.15-inch) action wheels with traction and stability control and a single pole retractable handle. It has two main compartments and a padded laptop compartment that fits notebooks with up to a 15.1-inch screen. Other storage features include a large front drawbridge compartment with an organizer, a front zippered stash pocket, and a side water bottle pocket. The Driver 8 also offers a padded back, tuck-away shoulder straps, and a quick-grab handle for easy carrying. 

 Specifications: 

 * Capacity: 2100 cubic inches/34 liters 
 * Weight: 4 pounds, 3 ounces 
 * Dimensions: 19.5 x 13 x 8 inches 
 * Fabric: 600D Poly, 420D Velocity 

About JanSport
For more than 30 years, JanSport has created products to help you carry the stuff you need, where you need it, in the most functional and fashionable way possible. JanSport's success extends across the globe, where they have become a leading designer and manufacturer of durable backpacks, luggage and gear. The company is headquartered in Appleton, Wisconsin, and has offices in the United States and Europe. Manufacturer Warranty
JanSport Outdoor Equipment is warranted to be free from defects in materials and workmanship for the life of the product. The warranty applies when the product is used for the purpose intended, under normal conditions, and does not apply to damages caused by typical wear and tear, unreasonable use, or neglect.
feature_bullets: Made in part with recycled materials
Two large main compartments with a padded sleeve that fits 15” laptop
Front utility pocket with organizer, front stash pocket, a fully padded back panel and side water bottle pocket
80 mm inline sake wheels with skid rails for added protection and tuck-away shoulder straps for converting to a backpack
Retractable two-stage handle and a padded grab handle
